context_bundle.summary: Model-View-Controller separates application into three components: Model (data + business logic), View (UI presentation), Controller (handles input, updates model). User interacts with View, Controller processes, Model updates, View refreshes.

onboarding.quick_start: Model-View-Controller separates application into three components: Model (data + business logic), View (UI presentation), Controller (handles input, updates model). User interacts with View, Controller processes, Model updates, View refreshes.
